channel.title: Comments on: Rabbi Yehuda Leon Ashkenazi on Interfaith
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://kavvanah.wordpress.com/2011/01/05/rabbi-yehuda-leon-ashkenazi-on-interfaith/#comment-2341">Yossi</a>.
There is material in Hebrew on Benny Levy. No english.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yossi.

There is material in Hebrew on Benny Levy. No english.

item.title: By: Yossi
item.dc:creator: Yossi
item.description: Do you know of English language resources dealing with Benny Levy? I'm interested in his story, but I can't find much in English.
item.content:encoded: Do you know of English language resources dealing with Benny Levy? I’m interested in his story, but I can’t find much in English.

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://kavvanah.wordpress.com/2011/01/05/rabbi-yehuda-leon-ashkenazi-on-interfaith/#comment-2339">Yossi</a>.
He does not claim influence but he certainly heard and knew Manitou. When Levinas gave his Talmudic lectures, Rabbi Ashkenazi and Andre Neher were on the same panel. In later years, it is possible that Manitou and Benny Levi could have been on the same panels in France or J-M. http://www.bennylevy.co.il/biographie.asp
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yossi.

He does not claim influence but he certainly heard and knew Manitou. When Levinas gave his Talmudic lectures, Rabbi Ashkenazi and Andre Neher were on the same panel. In later years, it is possible that Manitou and Benny Levi could have been on the same panels in France or J-M.
http://www.bennylevy.co.il/biographie.asp

item.title: By: Yossi
item.dc:creator: Yossi
item.description: Did he have any influence on Benny Levi?
item.content:encoded: Did he have any influence on Benny Levi?
